name: SkySpy
description:
It is the year 1945 - the defining final year of the Second World War. 

Disguised as the Germans, you must hide from enemy spotlights or risk getting caught in a firefight. 

Complete each level without being shot down to progress, and reach the enemy base so that you can steal vital documents to help win the war.

Controls:

WASD to MOVE

SPACEBAR to FIRE (only when in combat)
